comment: This is for PRWR 6000. Dr. Palmer is an excellent professor who gives amazing feedback on all work. There is a lot of reading for the course, but he prepares you in advance. There are no tests, four quizzes, one major paper, and discussion assignments. He uses the whole semester to build the final assignment so that it is not overwhelming.

This was PRWR 6000 nDr. Palmer is an excellent professor who gives amazing feedback on all work. There is a lot of reading for the course, but he prepares you in advance. There are no tests, four quizzes, one major paper, and discussion assignments. He uses the whole semester to build the final assignment so that it is not overwhelming.
Tough class but learned a lot. Works in Finance, so got some real world stories. Great Prof for Finance majors. You will get a great foundation.
